dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Culture, you know, it's like the bedrock of a nation's soul—it shapes everything from our streets to our stories.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Culture, you know, it's like the bedrock of a nation's soul-it shapes everything from our streets to our stories.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And President Tokayev really drove that home at the Akorda residence on May 20th, didn't he? He tied national cleanliness directly to cultural development.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And President Tokayev really drove that home at the Akorda residence on May twentieth, didn't he? He tied national cleanliness directly to cultural development.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A clean country, a reading society, and support for the arts " these are the priorities outlined by President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev during a ceremony honoring workers in culture and the arts on May 20. In his address, he emphasized the special meaning of the national campaign "Taza Kazakhstan" ("Clean Kazakhstan"), highlighting the connection between cleanliness and culture.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and he quoted that powerful line from Sherkhan Murtaza: "Books are the essence of culture." It's such a clear call to become a reading society.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and he quoted that powerful line from Sherkhan Murtaza: Books are the essence of culture. It's such a clear call to become a reading society.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As the outstanding writer Sherkhan Murtaza once said: 'MÃ¤deniettiÅ„ mÃ½egi " kitap' ('Books are the essence of culture'). If we want to build an advanced state, we must first become a nation of readers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But he also pointed out how tough that is in the age of the internet, right? Like, distractions are everywhere.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But he also pointed out how tough that is in the age of the internet, right? Like, distractions are everywhere.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Of course, this is not easy in a world where the internet has such a wide influence, but we must all strive toward this goal.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: True, but they're taking action—like establishing a Presidential Prize for young writers. That's a concrete step to encourage creativity.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True, but they're taking action-like establishing a Presidential Prize for young writers. That's a concrete step to encourage creativity.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Concrete steps are already being taken. A special Presidential Prize for young writers has been established.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And this year was the first National Book Day! It's cool that it got so much support, especially from young people.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And this year was the first National Book Day! It's cool that it got so much support, especially from young people.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This year, we celebrated the National Book Day for the first time. This valuable initiative received broad public support, especially among the youth.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It feels like part of a bigger picture, too—all those reforms in politics and economics are shaping a new national identity.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It feels like part of a bigger picture, too-all those reforms in politics and economics are shaping a new national identity.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kassym-Jomart Tokayev noted that in recent years, the country has carried out large-scale reforms affecting all spheres of life " from politics to the economy. He stated that national identity is now beginning to evolve and adapt to modern realities.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And he emphasized that culture and art have huge educational power—they help renew consciousness, set new ethical norms.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And he emphasized that culture and art have huge educational power-they help renew consciousness, set new ethical norms.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Culture and art play a special role in this process, as they possess tremendous educational potential. They help renew national consciousness. New ethical norms and values are gradually being established in society.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Which is why supporting artists and writers matters so much. Their work guides the youth toward innovation and hard work.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is why supporting artists and writers matters so much. Their work guides the youth toward innovation and hard work.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Your works serve as a guide for the younger generation. Through art and education, our youth are growing up creative, innovative, and hardworking.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And ultimately, that's how you build a Just and Prosperous state, like he said. Clean streets, enlightened minds—it all connects.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And ultimately, that's how you build a Just and Prosperous state, like he said. Clean streets, enlightened minds-it all connects.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Only by following this path can we become a truly Just, Safe, Clean, and Prosperous state.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's ambitious, but you gotta start somewhere, right? With bookshelf, not just brooms.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's ambitious, but you gotta start somewhere, right? With bookshelf, not just brooms.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And with the state backing cultural figures, it feels like there's real momentum here.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And with the state backing cultural figures, it feels like there's real momentum here.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President also stressed that the state will continue to provide comprehensive support to cultural figures.
